item.title: Design Philosophy
item.description: What underpins everything I do as a designer and leader.

item.title: Design Process
item.description: How I do what I do.

item.title: Clippings
item.description: Quotes and insights from books and other sources on mind, focus, and ethics.

item.title: Design & Problem Solving
item.description: Collection of insights on how to approach problems.

item.title: Evaluation & Clear Thinking
item.description: Rubric for making decisions, coming to terms with an idea or choice, or seeing through the muck.

item.title: Insight Systems
item.description: Explorations on how tangential thinking can lead to deep insights. Includes information on astrology, tarot, and more.

item.title: Deep Work, Quarantine Edition
item.description: Something I deeply believe is that if you’re able to have focused time to work, you’re going to be able to go further, faster, and deeper than those who don’t.

item.title: End of Day Ceremonies
item.description: How to empty your brain at the end of the day so you’re able to be present in your non-work life.
